query:
SELECT e.id, e.turmaId, e.tipoEvento, e.dataEvento 
FROM eventos e 
WHERE e.turmaId = (SELECT id FROM turmas WHERE codigo = '654' LIMIT 1)
AND e.tipoEvento = 'foto_estudio'
LIMIT 1;
